alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 2:12PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama, Jackson, northeastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun and eastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 400 PM EST/300 PM CST/... At 311 PM EST/211 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Graceville to 9 miles east of Vernon to near Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Chipley, Graceville, Marianna, Bradford, Malone, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Altha, Alford, Wausau, Madrid, Campbellton, Bascom, Moose Pond, Crosby, Grangeburg, Southern Junction and Camps Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
